items.title: Bluetti’s New Year Sale takes up to 53% off power stations and bundles + exclusive bonus savings – all from $119
items.summary:
Running alongside the winter backup deals we spotted, Bluetti also has an ongoing New Year Sale with up to 53% discounts across its power stations, bundles, and accessories. One notable return is the new Elite 400 Portable Power Station at $1,221.06 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5TOYS6OFF at checkout, beating out its Amazon pricing by $78. Having been released back in November with an original $2,999 MSRP, the price has since been cut to $2,699 when at full directly from Bluetti’s website, whereas it starts from $1,899 at Amazon. We saw Black Friday and Christmas sales take this model lowest to $1,299, with exclusive savings giving us this same rate we’re seeing again here. You’ll be getting $678 off the going rate during this event ($1,478 off the MSRP) and another shot at the lowest price we have tracked so far. Head below to also browse the full lineup of deals while they’re sticking around.

Through its official Amazon storefront, Sharge is offering its ICEMAG 2 10,000mAh 15W MagSafe Power Bank back at $49.90 shipped, but for $17 more you can grab the brand new one that delivers all that and more – its newest 25W descendant is currently down at its lowest price of $67.91 shipped in black or white after clipping the on-page 15% off coupon. What’s particularly nice about the deal on the newer model is the FREE 4.9-foot 240W USB-C charging cable you’ll be getting too, which only sweetens the pot.

more…

items.summary: The tanker, the Olina, is on multiple countries' sanctions list and is "suspected of carrying embargoed oil", US officials say.

items.title: Spring is months away, get cozy with these machine-washable slippers for $10 (Save 56%)
items.summary:
DREAM PAIRS Cozy Foam Slippers

Buy for $10 (Reg. $23)

Apply code RMSE7YUA during checkout.

What we love

Many of us still have to put up with cold winter weather for 2-3 months. Bearing that in mind, I think it’s a great idea to embrace the season and stay cozy when at home. These slippers can help, and I really like that they are machine washable.

items.title: This tiny new Anker 45W Nano charger with Smart Display can even match your Cosmic Orange iPhone, now at $30 [Launch deal]
items.summary:
One of our favorite reveals from CES this year has got to be Anker’s new 45W Nano charger with Smart Display, and you can already reserve your unit now with a nice launch deal. You can pre-order directly from Anker’s online store for $29.99 shipped, securing a $10 launch discount. Even at its full $40 asking price, this is Anker’s most affordable charger with a built-in display, which makes the early discount an even better value. It’s available in four finishes, including one that pairs perfectly with the Cosmic Orange iPhone 17 Pro models, so be sure to jump in and grab one after checking out the full details below.

more…

items.title: Power winter adventures with Bluetti’s Pioneer Na(Sodium) station at exclusive $759 pricing (Reg. $999), more
items.summary:
Bluetti currently has a winter backup sale running that is seeing up to 57% discounts across a lineup of power solutions – and our readers can currently score some exclusive extra savings, too. To cover your winter outdoor activities, you can find options like Bluetti’s new Pioneer Na(Sodium) Portable Power Station at $759.05 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5TOYS5OFF at checkout. Since its release in mid-October at $999, we’ve consistently seen this model drop down to $799 during sales, which fell as low as $735 with the exclusive 8% off code we had during Black Friday and Christmas sales. If you missed your chance for that all-time low, you’re getting the next-best price here while the sale continues, saving you a total $240 off the going rate and giving you a cold-proof source of power during winter outings. Head below to browse the full lineup of notable deals we’re seeing while they’re still around.

more…

items.title: Sharge’s 65W USB-C GaN charger with see-through design and retractable cable hits $36 low
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Sharge’s official storefront offering its 65W USB-C GaN charger with a retractable cable for $35.90 shipped. This is regularly a $50 unit, which is now seeing a 28% markdown. Today’s deal shaves $14 off its usual going rate, marking the return of the lowest price it first hit shortly after its debut last year. Discounts on this charger have been few and far between – it didn’t even receive a meaningful cut during Black Friday – so this deal is particularly worth considering if you’ve been eyeing a new charger. You can also get this in black and white colors, and they’re both down to the $36 low today. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Save up to $600 on Ride1Up’s New Year e-bike collection and secure your ride through 2026 starting from $995
items.summary:
Ride1Up has an ongoing New Year e-bike sale that is taking up to $600 off models, with the biggest of these discounts being on the Prodigy V2 Brose Step-Thru Mid-Drive 9-Speed e-bike that starts from $1,895 shipped, with its step-over variation sitting $100 higher, while the Prodigy V2 Belt-Drive configuration is going for $2,595 shipped. The chain-drive e-bike carries a $2,495 full price, and its belt-drive counterpart goes for $2,795, with most of the discounts in 2025 having been falls to $1,995 and $2,595. The belt-drive model seems to be keeping to its trend, but the chain-drive model is retaining the previous $600 discounts we saw during Black Friday and Christmas sales, giving you another shot at the best price we have tracked. You can browse the other offers during this event below.

more…
